response.overview: Two struggling pot farmers discover to their horror that some terrifying creature has damaged their crop. What happens next will shock you to your core. Their horrifying blood-soaked adventure will make you think twice about smoking the devilâ€™s weed. Your kindly loving government was always right, marijuana is no laughing matter. It truly is the most dangerous drug ever!  Plague of the Pot Rabbits is a short horror/comedy independent film. It pokes fun at DEA special agent Matt Fairbanks ridiculous comments about cannabis eating rabbits.
response.title: Plague of the Pot Rabbits
